Plot: A documentary crew followed Metallica for the better part of 2001-2003, a time of tension and release for the rock band, as they recorded their album St. Anger, fought bitterly, and sought the counsel of their on-call shrink.
Title: Metallica: Some Kind of Monster
Actors: James Hetfield, Lars Ulrich, Kirk Hammett, Robert Trujillo
tomatoConsensus: Fascinating behind-the-scenes look at how Metallica survives one of their more turbulent periods.
